---
title: Integrations Overview
description: Explore the Edgee platform's integrations with leading technologies.
---

With Edgee, intensive and sensitive tasks are shifted away from browsers and mobile
applications to the network layer, benefiting from distributed processing. This allows for faster
processing, reduced network congestion, and enhanced application performance.

Our platform supports a broad range of integrations across various categories, ensuring that you can harness the power of leading solutions
directly at the edge. Here's an overview of the technologies available within the Edgee platform.

#### Data & Analytics

Unlock the full potential of your data with Edgee's support for the leading Data & Analytics platforms. 
By using Edgee's Data & Analytics service, you'll no longer suffer from customer-side constraints, 
and you'll get back the data you've lost. 

**100% of the data, 100% legal, 100% real time.**

#### AB Testing

Make informed decisions and improve your user experience with Edgee's AB Testing support. 
Our platform integrates with leading solutions to help you deploy experiments and personalize 
content at the edge, reducing latency and improving accuracy.

#### Security

Security is paramount in today's digital landscape. Edgee integrates with top-tier security solutions to 
protect your applications from a wide range of threats, ensuring your users' data and your resources remain safe.
